td.a: Bracelets in Honor of Hailey Are Here - Please Complete Form for Delivery Purposes
td.br: If you ordered a bracelet as part of the district's second order, Mrs. Sharkey will arrange for delivery to you.

td.a: NJPSA/FEA & NJPTA Partner to Offer 3 Webinars to Support Families at This Time
td.br: The webinars, all of which are FREE, are on the following topics: Addressing the Social and Emotional Well Being of the Whole Family, Meeting the Needs of Students with Disabilities, and Using Social Media Responsibly to Engage Your Kids. Registration for each webinar is required.

td.a: Spring Break 'Staycation' Ideas and Suggestions from Our Student Assistance Coordinator
td.br: Mrs. Brady's newsletter offers ideas for family fun stay-at-home opportunities during the district's spring break!

td.a: Check out Mrs. Zematitis' Lesson on Energy which will be Featured on NJTV Learning Live!
td.br: Visit NJTVonline.org on Tuesday, April 14 at 10:00 a.m. to watch Mrs. Zematitis' awesome 4th grade science lesson. We're so proud of her efforts!

td.a: Let's Have Some Fun with a DTS Community Egg Hunt!
td.br: Check your mailboxes for a special letter detailing how we can all take part in an egg-cellent egg hunt even when we're not together. Keeping smiling DTS family! Stay safe and healthy!

td.a: Reminder: Meals are Available for All Students During the School Closure (Including During Spring Break)
td.br: Meals (breakfast and lunch) can be picked up on Mondays and Wednesdays of each week from 8:00 a.m. until 10:00 a.m. by the gym entrance.

td.a: Child Care Information is Available via the County's Child Care Resource and Referral Agency
td.br:
Parents and guardians in need of child care can contact the Child Care Resource and Referral Agency in their county. CCR&Rs will have the most up to date information on available care options and subsidies.
Go to www.nj.gov/dcf/coronavirus.

td.a: Updated March 27, 2020: DTS School Closure Preparedness Plan
td.br: Please review the district's plan which was submitted to and is on file with the Cumberland County Office of Education.

td.a: CANCELLED: Requests for Proposals for Independent Auditor & Architect of Record
td.br:
DUE TO THE CLOSURE OF SCHOOL RELATED TO COVID-19, RFP'S WILL NOT BE OPENED ON TUESDAY, MARCH 24, 2020. NOTICE OF REBIDDING FOR SUCH SERVICES WILL BE MADE AT A FUTURE DATE.
Interested parties should visit the Board of Education - Documents & Forms - Bids/RFP's page for RFP packets.
Proposals will be publicly opened on March 24, 2020.
